name: Tetrico
description:
Crush the blocks - can it be something more fun?

Tetrico is a simple and addictive casual crush game! Just tap to bounce your ball to smash the bricks which move in a steady stream! Crushing the bricks with a color ball never be so easy and fun!

How to play
- Fires the ball with a touch
- Hit the ball and give damages to the bricks
- Don't let the bricks come out of screen and be careful from moving obstacles.

Features
- Colourful 3d graphics
- Easy game controls
